metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Associate Director, Sponsored Ads Sales
content:
Job Summary:
Chewy is looking for a consumer-centric, data-driven sales leader to join our newly formed fast-paced Chewy Advertising business. As an AD, Sales you’ll have responsibility for leading a team of Partner Managers selling our advertising solutions to our family of vendors. You’ll own the strategy setting, account planning, forecasting, and sales functions of your team with ownership of relationships with primary internal and external constituencies.  Successful candidates should be charismatic, comfortable with ambiguity, and have experience delivering results in a fast-paced, dynamic business environment. 
 
What You’ll Do:

Be an expert on Chewy Advertising’s solutions (and help us to define features of new offerings)
Manage a focused, high performing, driven sales team
Attract, hire, and retain top sales talent
Enable your team to exceed sales, pricing, and yield goals.
Own forecasting of annual revenue goals
Own direct relationships with several strategic accounts.
Produce pitch materials and lead client meetings pre- and post-sale
Collaborate with internal teams including Campaign Management, Site Merchandising, and Marketing.
Develop and contribute to process improvement-inventing and simplifying.

 
What You’ll Need:

8+ years of experience selling digital advertising, experience within a Retail Media Network preferred
4+ years of experience managing high performing digital media sales teams
Demonstrated ability to consistently close sales and generate revenue with direct advertising partners and agencies
Ability to navigate data and leverage analytics to make decisions
Excellent organizational, interpersonal and communication (written and verbal) skills
Demonstrated success working with cross-functional teams and building strong relationships internally and externally
Ability to successfully operate in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment
Experience with Salesforce, Microsoft Office, and Tableau

 
Bonus:

Possess a talent for responding effectively to market direction, customer needs, and competitive positioning
Love of pets!!
Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

questions.label: Internal purposes only - no need to answer *
Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
